title: Ayurvedic Nasal Inhaler (Peppermint + Eucalyptus)
excerpt: Portable inhaler with peppermint and eucalyptus essential oils to briefly clear nasal passages and refresh focus.
content:
## What Is This Nasal Inhaler?
A pocket-sized inhaler containing a wick infused with diluted peppermint and eucalyptus essential oils for short-term nasal clearing and mental refreshment.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Cooling, aromatic botanicals like peppermint and eucalyptus help clear the head, support easier breathing briefly, and stimulate clarity—useful for on-the-go refreshment and focus.

### Key Benefits
- Quick, portable relief for mild nasal congestion.
- Invigorates and sharpens mental focus.
- Refillable and travel-friendly.

## Ingredients
- Peppermint essential oil (diluted)
- Eucalyptus essential oil (diluted)
- Inhaler tube with replaceable wick

## Usage Instructions
- Hold the inhaler near one nostril, close the other, inhale gently through the nose 1–3 times. Use as needed; avoid excessive use.

## Packaging
- Refillable inhaler tube with spare wick included.

## Safety & Consultation
- Not for infants or small children. Avoid if you have severe asthma or known sensitivity to essential oils. Discontinue if irritation occurs.

## Why Choose This Inhaler?
A natural, non-medicated way to support brief nasal clarity and mental alertness while traveling or working.
